name: Silverland Bến Thành
address: 14 - 16 Le Lai, Quận 1, TP. Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam
description:
Silverland Bến Thành nằm ở trung tâm Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh và gần Công viên Trung tâm. Chỗ nghỉ này cung cấp WiFi miễn phí trong toàn bộ khuôn viên.

Silverland Bến Thành nằm cách Chợ Bến Thành chỉ 1 phút đi bộ và Nhà thờ Đức Bà 800 m.

Phòng nghỉ lắp máy điều hòa tại đây được trang bị tiện nghi pha trà/cà phê, chai nước miễn phí, két an toàn và máy sấy tóc.

Silverland Ben Thanh nằm cạnh chợ Bến Thành, cách ngã tư các đường Lê Lợi và Nguyễn Huệ một quãng đi bộ ngắn.

review.rating: Xuất sắc
review.room_type: Phòng Spring Field (Không Có Cửa Sổ) Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive: Thiết kế độc đáo, nhân viên cực kì thân thiện. Nhất định sẽ quay lại khi có chuyến công tác tại Sài Gòn.

review.room_type: Phòng Sunshine Garden Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive:
Anna是最專業、親切、熱心的員工，不只會越南文、英語、中文也很流利，很感謝她幫忙我們。

這是一間舒適，地理位置非常好的飯店，下午茶很好吃，頂樓的健身房很棒，游泳池漂亮而且水質非常乾淨，員工都很親切，房間有冰箱、浴缸、床非常舒適。


Anna is the most professional, friendly, and enthusiastic staff member. She is not only fluent in Vietnamese, English, and Chinese but also very helpful. We are very grateful for her assistance.

This hotel is comfortable, well-located, with delicious afternoon tea. The rooftop gym is excellent, and the swimming pool is beautiful with very clean water. The staff is friendly, and the rooms are equipped with a refrigerator, bathtub, and very comfortable beds.

Anna là nhân viên chuyên nghiệp, thân thiện và nhiệt tình nhất. Cô ấy không chỉ giỏi tiếng Việt, tiếng Anh, và tiếng Trung mà còn rất hữu ích. Chúng tôi rất biết ơn sự giúp đỡ của cô ấy.
Khách sạn này thoải mái, vị trí rất tốt, có bữa trưa ngon. Phòng tập gym trên tầng mái rất tuyệt vời, và hồ bơi đẹp với nước rất sạch sẽ. Nhân viên thân thiện, và phòng có tủ lạnh, bồn tắm, và giường rất thoải mái.

review.rating: The staff was fantastic, services was friendly and very prompt, and the hotel itself is quirky and fun. Location was per
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Sense City Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive: The friendly staff and service provided, and the breakfast buffet!

review.rating: That was great!
review.room_type: Phòng Spring Field (Không Có Cửa Sổ) Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive:
The hotel was conveniently located, the facilities were up-to-date, and the staff were friendly and helpful. 

We were offered a welcome drink on arrival! Our room was very well equipped for a relaxing time after a long day walking around.

The architecture was even better than the pictures - it was almost as if it were a sightseeing expedition in itself.

The staff, especially Viet, Jennifer, Billy, Ha, Nancy, were very motivated and enthusiastic. They even took time out from their day to talk to us about Vietnam and Vietnamese culture. They gave us tips and made suggestions for things to do and places to eat.
review.comment_negative: It was a bit awkward having to go through the dining area to access the pool, but the inconvenience was minor. The pool area was too small for the size of the hotel, but we enjoyed the view and the infinity pool. We also enjoyed the sauna, steam room and jacuzzi.

review.rating: Rất tốt
review.room_type: Phòng Sunshine Garden Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive: Clean rooms, very friendly staff, good location, nice place to stay in Ho Chi Minh

review.rating: Amazing service , staff outstanding super helpful and sweet ! Definitely will recommend

review.rating: Great place to stay!
review.room_type: Phòng Sunshine Garden Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive: Location is excellent, literally over the road from the markets. Staff are kind and attentive. Small touches like having the bell boy carry your luggage is appreciated and makes this a good place to stay.
review.comment_negative: The only issue I had was that the bath wasn't attached to the wall in any way so the tub rocked from side to side when trying to shower. For someone unstable this could be an issue.

review.comment_positive: Location is excellent, literally over the road from the markets. Staff are kind and attentive. Small touches like having the bell boy carry your luggage is appreciated and makes this a good place to stay.
review.comment_negative: The only issue I had was that the bath wasn't attached to the wall in any way so the tub rocked from side to side when trying to shower. For someone unstable this could be an issue.

review.rating: Perfect hotel in deal location . An oasis in the craziness of HCM
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Sense City Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive: Modern design with excellent facilities

review.rating: Xuất sắc
review.room_type: Phòng Spring Field (Không Có Cửa Sổ) Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive: Thiết kế độc đáo, nhân viên cực kì thân thiện. Nhất định sẽ quay lại khi có chuyến công tác tại Sài Gòn.

review.room_type: Phòng Sunshine Garden Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive:
Anna是最專業、親切、熱心的員工，不只會越南文、英語、中文也很流利，很感謝她幫忙我們。

這是一間舒適，地理位置非常好的飯店，下午茶很好吃，頂樓的健身房很棒，游泳池漂亮而且水質非常乾淨，員工都很親切，房間有冰箱、浴缸、床非常舒適。


Anna is the most professional, friendly, and enthusiastic staff member. She is not only fluent in Vietnamese, English, and Chinese but also very helpful. We are very grateful for her assistance.

This hotel is comfortable, well-located, with delicious afternoon tea. The rooftop gym is excellent, and the swimming pool is beautiful with very clean water. The staff is friendly, and the rooms are equipped with a refrigerator, bathtub, and very comfortable beds.

Anna là nhân viên chuyên nghiệp, thân thiện và nhiệt tình nhất. Cô ấy không chỉ giỏi tiếng Việt, tiếng Anh, và tiếng Trung mà còn rất hữu ích. Chúng tôi rất biết ơn sự giúp đỡ của cô ấy.
Khách sạn này thoải mái, vị trí rất tốt, có bữa trưa ngon. Phòng tập gym trên tầng mái rất tuyệt vời, và hồ bơi đẹp với nước rất sạch sẽ. Nhân viên thân thiện, và phòng có tủ lạnh, bồn tắm, và giường rất thoải mái.

review.rating: The staff was fantastic, services was friendly and very prompt, and the hotel itself is quirky and fun. Location was per
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Sense City Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive: The friendly staff and service provided, and the breakfast buffet!

review.rating: That was great!
review.room_type: Phòng Spring Field (Không Có Cửa Sổ) Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive:
The hotel was conveniently located, the facilities were up-to-date, and the staff were friendly and helpful. 

We were offered a welcome drink on arrival! Our room was very well equipped for a relaxing time after a long day walking around.

The architecture was even better than the pictures - it was almost as if it were a sightseeing expedition in itself.

The staff, especially Viet, Jennifer, Billy, Ha, Nancy, were very motivated and enthusiastic. They even took time out from their day to talk to us about Vietnam and Vietnamese culture. They gave us tips and made suggestions for things to do and places to eat.
review.comment_negative: It was a bit awkward having to go through the dining area to access the pool, but the inconvenience was minor. The pool area was too small for the size of the hotel, but we enjoyed the view and the infinity pool. We also enjoyed the sauna, steam room and jacuzzi.

review.rating: Rất tốt
review.room_type: Phòng Sunshine Garden Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive: Clean rooms, very friendly staff, good location, nice place to stay in Ho Chi Minh

review.rating: Amazing service , staff outstanding super helpful and sweet ! Definitely will recommend
review.room_type: Phòng Signature Ben Thanh Giường Đôi (Kèm Trà Chiều)
review.comment_positive: The concept is really cute very well done up !

review.rating: The staff were so nice , does any think to make your stay memorable.

review.rating: We were there for work and pleasure. We loved the hotel.  The staff were so friendly and took care of anything we needed
review.room_type: Phòng Signature Ben Thanh 2 Giường Đơn (Kèm Trà Chiều)
review.comment_positive: Very hip and funky. Staff was so attentive. Sound proofing in the rooms were very very good. Beds were comfy. I slept like a baby
review.comment_negative: We wish there were toilet paper holders in the bathrooms

review.rating: Xuất sắc
review.room_type: Phòng Spring Field (Không Có Cửa Sổ) Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive: Thiết kế độc đáo, nhân viên cực kì thân thiện. Nhất định sẽ quay lại khi có chuyến công tác tại Sài Gòn.

review.room_type: Phòng Sunshine Garden Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive:
Anna是最專業、親切、熱心的員工，不只會越南文、英語、中文也很流利，很感謝她幫忙我們。

這是一間舒適，地理位置非常好的飯店，下午茶很好吃，頂樓的健身房很棒，游泳池漂亮而且水質非常乾淨，員工都很親切，房間有冰箱、浴缸、床非常舒適。


Anna is the most professional, friendly, and enthusiastic staff member. She is not only fluent in Vietnamese, English, and Chinese but also very helpful. We are very grateful for her assistance.

This hotel is comfortable, well-located, with delicious afternoon tea. The rooftop gym is excellent, and the swimming pool is beautiful with very clean water. The staff is friendly, and the rooms are equipped with a refrigerator, bathtub, and very comfortable beds.

Anna là nhân viên chuyên nghiệp, thân thiện và nhiệt tình nhất. Cô ấy không chỉ giỏi tiếng Việt, tiếng Anh, và tiếng Trung mà còn rất hữu ích. Chúng tôi rất biết ơn sự giúp đỡ của cô ấy.
Khách sạn này thoải mái, vị trí rất tốt, có bữa trưa ngon. Phòng tập gym trên tầng mái rất tuyệt vời, và hồ bơi đẹp với nước rất sạch sẽ. Nhân viên thân thiện, và phòng có tủ lạnh, bồn tắm, và giường rất thoải mái.

review.rating: The staff was fantastic, services was friendly and very prompt, and the hotel itself is quirky and fun. Location was per
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Sense City Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive: The friendly staff and service provided, and the breakfast buffet!

review.rating: That was great!
review.room_type: Phòng Spring Field (Không Có Cửa Sổ) Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive:
The hotel was conveniently located, the facilities were up-to-date, and the staff were friendly and helpful. 

We were offered a welcome drink on arrival! Our room was very well equipped for a relaxing time after a long day walking around.

The architecture was even better than the pictures - it was almost as if it were a sightseeing expedition in itself.

The staff, especially Viet, Jennifer, Billy, Ha, Nancy, were very motivated and enthusiastic. They even took time out from their day to talk to us about Vietnam and Vietnamese culture. They gave us tips and made suggestions for things to do and places to eat.
review.comment_negative: It was a bit awkward having to go through the dining area to access the pool, but the inconvenience was minor. The pool area was too small for the size of the hotel, but we enjoyed the view and the infinity pool. We also enjoyed the sauna, steam room and jacuzzi.

review.comment_positive: Clean rooms, very friendly staff, good location, nice place to stay in Ho Chi Minh

Anna是最專業、親切、熱心的員工，不只會越南文、英語、中文也很流利，很感謝她幫忙我們。

這是一間舒適，地理位置非常好的飯店，下午茶很好吃，頂樓的健身房很棒，游泳池漂亮而且水質非常乾淨，員工都很親切，房間有冰箱、浴缸、床非常舒適。


Anna is the most professional, friendly, and enthusiastic staff member. She is not only fluent in Vietnamese, English, and Chinese but also very helpful. We are very grateful for her assistance.

This hotel is comfortable, well-located, with delicious afternoon tea. The rooftop gym is excellent, and the swimming pool is beautiful with very clean water. The staff is friendly, and the rooms are equipped with a refrigerator, bathtub, and very comfortable beds.

Anna là nhân viên chuyên nghiệp, thân thiện và nhiệt tình nhất. Cô ấy không chỉ giỏi tiếng Việt, tiếng Anh, và tiếng Trung mà còn rất hữu ích. Chúng tôi rất biết ơn sự giúp đỡ của cô ấy.
Khách sạn này thoải mái, vị trí rất tốt, có bữa trưa ngon. Phòng tập gym trên tầng mái rất tuyệt vời, và hồ bơi đẹp với nước rất sạch sẽ. Nhân viên thân thiện, và phòng có tủ lạnh, bồn tắm, và giường rất thoải mái.

review.rating: The staff was fantastic, services was friendly and very prompt, and the hotel itself is quirky and fun. Location was per
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Sense City Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive: The friendly staff and service provided, and the breakfast buffet!

review.rating: That was great!
review.room_type: Phòng Spring Field (Không Có Cửa Sổ) Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive:
The hotel was conveniently located, the facilities were up-to-date, and the staff were friendly and helpful. 

We were offered a welcome drink on arrival! Our room was very well equipped for a relaxing time after a long day walking around.

The architecture was even better than the pictures - it was almost as if it were a sightseeing expedition in itself.

The staff, especially Viet, Jennifer, Billy, Ha, Nancy, were very motivated and enthusiastic. They even took time out from their day to talk to us about Vietnam and Vietnamese culture. They gave us tips and made suggestions for things to do and places to eat.
review.comment_negative: It was a bit awkward having to go through the dining area to access the pool, but the inconvenience was minor. The pool area was too small for the size of the hotel, but we enjoyed the view and the infinity pool. We also enjoyed the sauna, steam room and jacuzzi.

Anna is the most professional, friendly, and enthusiastic staff member. She is not only fluent in Vietnamese, English, and Chinese but also very helpful. We are very grateful for her assistance.

This hotel is comfortable, well-located, with delicious afternoon tea. The rooftop gym is excellent, and the swimming pool is beautiful with very clean water. The staff is friendly, and the rooms are equipped with a refrigerator, bathtub, and very comfortable beds.

Anna là nhân viên chuyên nghiệp, thân thiện và nhiệt tình nhất. Cô ấy không chỉ giỏi tiếng Việt, tiếng Anh, và tiếng Trung mà còn rất hữu ích. Chúng tôi rất biết ơn sự giúp đỡ của cô ấy.
Khách sạn này thoải mái, vị trí rất tốt, có bữa trưa ngon. Phòng tập gym trên tầng mái rất tuyệt vời, và hồ bơi đẹp với nước rất sạch sẽ. Nhân viên thân thiện, và phòng có tủ lạnh, bồn tắm, và giường rất thoải mái.

review.rating: The staff was fantastic, services was friendly and very prompt, and the hotel itself is quirky and fun. Location was per
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Sense City Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive: The friendly staff and service provided, and the breakfast buffet!

review.rating: That was great!
review.room_type: Phòng Spring Field (Không Có Cửa Sổ) Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive:
The hotel was conveniently located, the facilities were up-to-date, and the staff were friendly and helpful. 

We were offered a welcome drink on arrival! Our room was very well equipped for a relaxing time after a long day walking around.

The architecture was even better than the pictures - it was almost as if it were a sightseeing expedition in itself.

The staff, especially Viet, Jennifer, Billy, Ha, Nancy, were very motivated and enthusiastic. They even took time out from their day to talk to us about Vietnam and Vietnamese culture. They gave us tips and made suggestions for things to do and places to eat.
review.comment_negative: It was a bit awkward having to go through the dining area to access the pool, but the inconvenience was minor. The pool area was too small for the size of the hotel, but we enjoyed the view and the infinity pool. We also enjoyed the sauna, steam room and jacuzzi.

Anna is the most professional, friendly, and enthusiastic staff member. She is not only fluent in Vietnamese, English, and Chinese but also very helpful. We are very grateful for her assistance.

This hotel is comfortable, well-located, with delicious afternoon tea. The rooftop gym is excellent, and the swimming pool is beautiful with very clean water. The staff is friendly, and the rooms are equipped with a refrigerator, bathtub, and very comfortable beds.

Anna là nhân viên chuyên nghiệp, thân thiện và nhiệt tình nhất. Cô ấy không chỉ giỏi tiếng Việt, tiếng Anh, và tiếng Trung mà còn rất hữu ích. Chúng tôi rất biết ơn sự giúp đỡ của cô ấy.
Khách sạn này thoải mái, vị trí rất tốt, có bữa trưa ngon. Phòng tập gym trên tầng mái rất tuyệt vời, và hồ bơi đẹp với nước rất sạch sẽ. Nhân viên thân thiện, và phòng có tủ lạnh, bồn tắm, và giường rất thoải mái.

review.rating: The staff was fantastic, services was friendly and very prompt, and the hotel itself is quirky and fun. Location was per
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Sense City Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive: The friendly staff and service provided, and the breakfast buffet!

review.rating: That was great!
review.room_type: Phòng Spring Field (Không Có Cửa Sổ) Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive:
The hotel was conveniently located, the facilities were up-to-date, and the staff were friendly and helpful. 

We were offered a welcome drink on arrival! Our room was very well equipped for a relaxing time after a long day walking around.

The architecture was even better than the pictures - it was almost as if it were a sightseeing expedition in itself.

The staff, especially Viet, Jennifer, Billy, Ha, Nancy, were very motivated and enthusiastic. They even took time out from their day to talk to us about Vietnam and Vietnamese culture. They gave us tips and made suggestions for things to do and places to eat.
review.comment_negative: It was a bit awkward having to go through the dining area to access the pool, but the inconvenience was minor. The pool area was too small for the size of the hotel, but we enjoyed the view and the infinity pool. We also enjoyed the sauna, steam room and jacuzzi.

Anna is the most professional, friendly, and enthusiastic staff member. She is not only fluent in Vietnamese, English, and Chinese but also very helpful. We are very grateful for her assistance.

This hotel is comfortable, well-located, with delicious afternoon tea. The rooftop gym is excellent, and the swimming pool is beautiful with very clean water. The staff is friendly, and the rooms are equipped with a refrigerator, bathtub, and very comfortable beds.

Anna là nhân viên chuyên nghiệp, thân thiện và nhiệt tình nhất. Cô ấy không chỉ giỏi tiếng Việt, tiếng Anh, và tiếng Trung mà còn rất hữu ích. Chúng tôi rất biết ơn sự giúp đỡ của cô ấy.
Khách sạn này thoải mái, vị trí rất tốt, có bữa trưa ngon. Phòng tập gym trên tầng mái rất tuyệt vời, và hồ bơi đẹp với nước rất sạch sẽ. Nhân viên thân thiện, và phòng có tủ lạnh, bồn tắm, và giường rất thoải mái.

review.rating: The staff was fantastic, services was friendly and very prompt, and the hotel itself is quirky and fun. Location was per
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Sense City Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive: The friendly staff and service provided, and the breakfast buffet!

review.rating: That was great!
review.room_type: Phòng Spring Field (Không Có Cửa Sổ) Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive:
The hotel was conveniently located, the facilities were up-to-date, and the staff were friendly and helpful. 

We were offered a welcome drink on arrival! Our room was very well equipped for a relaxing time after a long day walking around.

The architecture was even better than the pictures - it was almost as if it were a sightseeing expedition in itself.

The staff, especially Viet, Jennifer, Billy, Ha, Nancy, were very motivated and enthusiastic. They even took time out from their day to talk to us about Vietnam and Vietnamese culture. They gave us tips and made suggestions for things to do and places to eat.
review.comment_negative: It was a bit awkward having to go through the dining area to access the pool, but the inconvenience was minor. The pool area was too small for the size of the hotel, but we enjoyed the view and the infinity pool. We also enjoyed the sauna, steam room and jacuzzi.

Anna is the most professional, friendly, and enthusiastic staff member. She is not only fluent in Vietnamese, English, and Chinese but also very helpful. We are very grateful for her assistance.

This hotel is comfortable, well-located, with delicious afternoon tea. The rooftop gym is excellent, and the swimming pool is beautiful with very clean water. The staff is friendly, and the rooms are equipped with a refrigerator, bathtub, and very comfortable beds.

Anna là nhân viên chuyên nghiệp, thân thiện và nhiệt tình nhất. Cô ấy không chỉ giỏi tiếng Việt, tiếng Anh, và tiếng Trung mà còn rất hữu ích. Chúng tôi rất biết ơn sự giúp đỡ của cô ấy.
Khách sạn này thoải mái, vị trí rất tốt, có bữa trưa ngon. Phòng tập gym trên tầng mái rất tuyệt vời, và hồ bơi đẹp với nước rất sạch sẽ. Nhân viên thân thiện, và phòng có tủ lạnh, bồn tắm, và giường rất thoải mái.

review.rating: The staff was fantastic, services was friendly and very prompt, and the hotel itself is quirky and fun. Location was per
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Sense City Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive: The friendly staff and service provided, and the breakfast buffet!

review.rating: That was great!
review.room_type: Phòng Spring Field (Không Có Cửa Sổ) Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive:
The hotel was conveniently located, the facilities were up-to-date, and the staff were friendly and helpful. 

We were offered a welcome drink on arrival! Our room was very well equipped for a relaxing time after a long day walking around.

The architecture was even better than the pictures - it was almost as if it were a sightseeing expedition in itself.

The staff, especially Viet, Jennifer, Billy, Ha, Nancy, were very motivated and enthusiastic. They even took time out from their day to talk to us about Vietnam and Vietnamese culture. They gave us tips and made suggestions for things to do and places to eat.
review.comment_negative: It was a bit awkward having to go through the dining area to access the pool, but the inconvenience was minor. The pool area was too small for the size of the hotel, but we enjoyed the view and the infinity pool. We also enjoyed the sauna, steam room and jacuzzi.

Anna is the most professional, friendly, and enthusiastic staff member. She is not only fluent in Vietnamese, English, and Chinese but also very helpful. We are very grateful for her assistance.

This hotel is comfortable, well-located, with delicious afternoon tea. The rooftop gym is excellent, and the swimming pool is beautiful with very clean water. The staff is friendly, and the rooms are equipped with a refrigerator, bathtub, and very comfortable beds.

Anna là nhân viên chuyên nghiệp, thân thiện và nhiệt tình nhất. Cô ấy không chỉ giỏi tiếng Việt, tiếng Anh, và tiếng Trung mà còn rất hữu ích. Chúng tôi rất biết ơn sự giúp đỡ của cô ấy.
Khách sạn này thoải mái, vị trí rất tốt, có bữa trưa ngon. Phòng tập gym trên tầng mái rất tuyệt vời, và hồ bơi đẹp với nước rất sạch sẽ. Nhân viên thân thiện, và phòng có tủ lạnh, bồn tắm, và giường rất thoải mái.

review.rating: The staff was fantastic, services was friendly and very prompt, and the hotel itself is quirky and fun. Location was per
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Sense City Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive: The friendly staff and service provided, and the breakfast buffet!

review.rating: That was great!
review.room_type: Phòng Spring Field (Không Có Cửa Sổ) Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive:
The hotel was conveniently located, the facilities were up-to-date, and the staff were friendly and helpful. 

We were offered a welcome drink on arrival! Our room was very well equipped for a relaxing time after a long day walking around.

The architecture was even better than the pictures - it was almost as if it were a sightseeing expedition in itself.

The staff, especially Viet, Jennifer, Billy, Ha, Nancy, were very motivated and enthusiastic. They even took time out from their day to talk to us about Vietnam and Vietnamese culture. They gave us tips and made suggestions for things to do and places to eat.
review.comment_negative: It was a bit awkward having to go through the dining area to access the pool, but the inconvenience was minor. The pool area was too small for the size of the hotel, but we enjoyed the view and the infinity pool. We also enjoyed the sauna, steam room and jacuzzi.

Anna is the most professional, friendly, and enthusiastic staff member. She is not only fluent in Vietnamese, English, and Chinese but also very helpful. We are very grateful for her assistance.

This hotel is comfortable, well-located, with delicious afternoon tea. The rooftop gym is excellent, and the swimming pool is beautiful with very clean water. The staff is friendly, and the rooms are equipped with a refrigerator, bathtub, and very comfortable beds.

Anna là nhân viên chuyên nghiệp, thân thiện và nhiệt tình nhất. Cô ấy không chỉ giỏi tiếng Việt, tiếng Anh, và tiếng Trung mà còn rất hữu ích. Chúng tôi rất biết ơn sự giúp đỡ của cô ấy.
Khách sạn này thoải mái, vị trí rất tốt, có bữa trưa ngon. Phòng tập gym trên tầng mái rất tuyệt vời, và hồ bơi đẹp với nước rất sạch sẽ. Nhân viên thân thiện, và phòng có tủ lạnh, bồn tắm, và giường rất thoải mái.

review.rating: The staff was fantastic, services was friendly and very prompt, and the hotel itself is quirky and fun. Location was per
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Sense City Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive: The friendly staff and service provided, and the breakfast buffet!

review.rating: That was great!
review.room_type: Phòng Spring Field (Không Có Cửa Sổ) Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive:
The hotel was conveniently located, the facilities were up-to-date, and the staff were friendly and helpful. 

We were offered a welcome drink on arrival! Our room was very well equipped for a relaxing time after a long day walking around.

The architecture was even better than the pictures - it was almost as if it were a sightseeing expedition in itself.

The staff, especially Viet, Jennifer, Billy, Ha, Nancy, were very motivated and enthusiastic. They even took time out from their day to talk to us about Vietnam and Vietnamese culture. They gave us tips and made suggestions for things to do and places to eat.
review.comment_negative: It was a bit awkward having to go through the dining area to access the pool, but the inconvenience was minor. The pool area was too small for the size of the hotel, but we enjoyed the view and the infinity pool. We also enjoyed the sauna, steam room and jacuzzi.

Anna is the most professional, friendly, and enthusiastic staff member. She is not only fluent in Vietnamese, English, and Chinese but also very helpful. We are very grateful for her assistance.

This hotel is comfortable, well-located, with delicious afternoon tea. The rooftop gym is excellent, and the swimming pool is beautiful with very clean water. The staff is friendly, and the rooms are equipped with a refrigerator, bathtub, and very comfortable beds.

Anna là nhân viên chuyên nghiệp, thân thiện và nhiệt tình nhất. Cô ấy không chỉ giỏi tiếng Việt, tiếng Anh, và tiếng Trung mà còn rất hữu ích. Chúng tôi rất biết ơn sự giúp đỡ của cô ấy.
Khách sạn này thoải mái, vị trí rất tốt, có bữa trưa ngon. Phòng tập gym trên tầng mái rất tuyệt vời, và hồ bơi đẹp với nước rất sạch sẽ. Nhân viên thân thiện, và phòng có tủ lạnh, bồn tắm, và giường rất thoải mái.

review.rating: The staff was fantastic, services was friendly and very prompt, and the hotel itself is quirky and fun. Location was per
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Sense City Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive: The friendly staff and service provided, and the breakfast buffet!

review.rating: That was great!
review.room_type: Phòng Spring Field (Không Có Cửa Sổ) Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive:
The hotel was conveniently located, the facilities were up-to-date, and the staff were friendly and helpful. 

We were offered a welcome drink on arrival! Our room was very well equipped for a relaxing time after a long day walking around.

The architecture was even better than the pictures - it was almost as if it were a sightseeing expedition in itself.

The staff, especially Viet, Jennifer, Billy, Ha, Nancy, were very motivated and enthusiastic. They even took time out from their day to talk to us about Vietnam and Vietnamese culture. They gave us tips and made suggestions for things to do and places to eat.
review.comment_negative: It was a bit awkward having to go through the dining area to access the pool, but the inconvenience was minor. The pool area was too small for the size of the hotel, but we enjoyed the view and the infinity pool. We also enjoyed the sauna, steam room and jacuzzi.

Anna is the most professional, friendly, and enthusiastic staff member. She is not only fluent in Vietnamese, English, and Chinese but also very helpful. We are very grateful for her assistance.

This hotel is comfortable, well-located, with delicious afternoon tea. The rooftop gym is excellent, and the swimming pool is beautiful with very clean water. The staff is friendly, and the rooms are equipped with a refrigerator, bathtub, and very comfortable beds.

Anna là nhân viên chuyên nghiệp, thân thiện và nhiệt tình nhất. Cô ấy không chỉ giỏi tiếng Việt, tiếng Anh, và tiếng Trung mà còn rất hữu ích. Chúng tôi rất biết ơn sự giúp đỡ của cô ấy.
Khách sạn này thoải mái, vị trí rất tốt, có bữa trưa ngon. Phòng tập gym trên tầng mái rất tuyệt vời, và hồ bơi đẹp với nước rất sạch sẽ. Nhân viên thân thiện, và phòng có tủ lạnh, bồn tắm, và giường rất thoải mái.

review.rating: The staff was fantastic, services was friendly and very prompt, and the hotel itself is quirky and fun. Location was per
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Sense City Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive: The friendly staff and service provided, and the breakfast buffet!

review.rating: That was great!
review.room_type: Phòng Spring Field (Không Có Cửa Sổ) Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive:
The hotel was conveniently located, the facilities were up-to-date, and the staff were friendly and helpful. 

We were offered a welcome drink on arrival! Our room was very well equipped for a relaxing time after a long day walking around.

The architecture was even better than the pictures - it was almost as if it were a sightseeing expedition in itself.

The staff, especially Viet, Jennifer, Billy, Ha, Nancy, were very motivated and enthusiastic. They even took time out from their day to talk to us about Vietnam and Vietnamese culture. They gave us tips and made suggestions for things to do and places to eat.
review.comment_negative: It was a bit awkward having to go through the dining area to access the pool, but the inconvenience was minor. The pool area was too small for the size of the hotel, but we enjoyed the view and the infinity pool. We also enjoyed the sauna, steam room and jacuzzi.

Anna is the most professional, friendly, and enthusiastic staff member. She is not only fluent in Vietnamese, English, and Chinese but also very helpful. We are very grateful for her assistance.

This hotel is comfortable, well-located, with delicious afternoon tea. The rooftop gym is excellent, and the swimming pool is beautiful with very clean water. The staff is friendly, and the rooms are equipped with a refrigerator, bathtub, and very comfortable beds.

Anna là nhân viên chuyên nghiệp, thân thiện và nhiệt tình nhất. Cô ấy không chỉ giỏi tiếng Việt, tiếng Anh, và tiếng Trung mà còn rất hữu ích. Chúng tôi rất biết ơn sự giúp đỡ của cô ấy.
Khách sạn này thoải mái, vị trí rất tốt, có bữa trưa ngon. Phòng tập gym trên tầng mái rất tuyệt vời, và hồ bơi đẹp với nước rất sạch sẽ. Nhân viên thân thiện, và phòng có tủ lạnh, bồn tắm, và giường rất thoải mái.

review.rating: The staff was fantastic, services was friendly and very prompt, and the hotel itself is quirky and fun. Location was per
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Sense City Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive: The friendly staff and service provided, and the breakfast buffet!

review.rating: That was great!
review.room_type: Phòng Spring Field (Không Có Cửa Sổ) Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive:
The hotel was conveniently located, the facilities were up-to-date, and the staff were friendly and helpful. 

We were offered a welcome drink on arrival! Our room was very well equipped for a relaxing time after a long day walking around.

The architecture was even better than the pictures - it was almost as if it were a sightseeing expedition in itself.

The staff, especially Viet, Jennifer, Billy, Ha, Nancy, were very motivated and enthusiastic. They even took time out from their day to talk to us about Vietnam and Vietnamese culture. They gave us tips and made suggestions for things to do and places to eat.
review.comment_negative: It was a bit awkward having to go through the dining area to access the pool, but the inconvenience was minor. The pool area was too small for the size of the hotel, but we enjoyed the view and the infinity pool. We also enjoyed the sauna, steam room and jacuzzi.

Anna is the most professional, friendly, and enthusiastic staff member. She is not only fluent in Vietnamese, English, and Chinese but also very helpful. We are very grateful for her assistance.

This hotel is comfortable, well-located, with delicious afternoon tea. The rooftop gym is excellent, and the swimming pool is beautiful with very clean water. The staff is friendly, and the rooms are equipped with a refrigerator, bathtub, and very comfortable beds.

Anna là nhân viên chuyên nghiệp, thân thiện và nhiệt tình nhất. Cô ấy không chỉ giỏi tiếng Việt, tiếng Anh, và tiếng Trung mà còn rất hữu ích. Chúng tôi rất biết ơn sự giúp đỡ của cô ấy.
Khách sạn này thoải mái, vị trí rất tốt, có bữa trưa ngon. Phòng tập gym trên tầng mái rất tuyệt vời, và hồ bơi đẹp với nước rất sạch sẽ. Nhân viên thân thiện, và phòng có tủ lạnh, bồn tắm, và giường rất thoải mái.

review.rating: The staff was fantastic, services was friendly and very prompt, and the hotel itself is quirky and fun. Location was per
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Sense City Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive: The friendly staff and service provided, and the breakfast buffet!

review.rating: That was great!
review.room_type: Phòng Spring Field (Không Có Cửa Sổ) Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive:
The hotel was conveniently located, the facilities were up-to-date, and the staff were friendly and helpful. 

We were offered a welcome drink on arrival! Our room was very well equipped for a relaxing time after a long day walking around.

The architecture was even better than the pictures - it was almost as if it were a sightseeing expedition in itself.

The staff, especially Viet, Jennifer, Billy, Ha, Nancy, were very motivated and enthusiastic. They even took time out from their day to talk to us about Vietnam and Vietnamese culture. They gave us tips and made suggestions for things to do and places to eat.
review.comment_negative: It was a bit awkward having to go through the dining area to access the pool, but the inconvenience was minor. The pool area was too small for the size of the hotel, but we enjoyed the view and the infinity pool. We also enjoyed the sauna, steam room and jacuzzi.

Anna is the most professional, friendly, and enthusiastic staff member. She is not only fluent in Vietnamese, English, and Chinese but also very helpful. We are very grateful for her assistance.

This hotel is comfortable, well-located, with delicious afternoon tea. The rooftop gym is excellent, and the swimming pool is beautiful with very clean water. The staff is friendly, and the rooms are equipped with a refrigerator, bathtub, and very comfortable beds.

Anna là nhân viên chuyên nghiệp, thân thiện và nhiệt tình nhất. Cô ấy không chỉ giỏi tiếng Việt, tiếng Anh, và tiếng Trung mà còn rất hữu ích. Chúng tôi rất biết ơn sự giúp đỡ của cô ấy.
Khách sạn này thoải mái, vị trí rất tốt, có bữa trưa ngon. Phòng tập gym trên tầng mái rất tuyệt vời, và hồ bơi đẹp với nước rất sạch sẽ. Nhân viên thân thiện, và phòng có tủ lạnh, bồn tắm, và giường rất thoải mái.

review.rating: The staff was fantastic, services was friendly and very prompt, and the hotel itself is quirky and fun. Location was per
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Sense City Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive: The friendly staff and service provided, and the breakfast buffet!

review.rating: That was great!
review.room_type: Phòng Spring Field (Không Có Cửa Sổ) Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive:
The hotel was conveniently located, the facilities were up-to-date, and the staff were friendly and helpful. 

We were offered a welcome drink on arrival! Our room was very well equipped for a relaxing time after a long day walking around.

The architecture was even better than the pictures - it was almost as if it were a sightseeing expedition in itself.

The staff, especially Viet, Jennifer, Billy, Ha, Nancy, were very motivated and enthusiastic. They even took time out from their day to talk to us about Vietnam and Vietnamese culture. They gave us tips and made suggestions for things to do and places to eat.
review.comment_negative: It was a bit awkward having to go through the dining area to access the pool, but the inconvenience was minor. The pool area was too small for the size of the hotel, but we enjoyed the view and the infinity pool. We also enjoyed the sauna, steam room and jacuzzi.

Anna is the most professional, friendly, and enthusiastic staff member. She is not only fluent in Vietnamese, English, and Chinese but also very helpful. We are very grateful for her assistance.

This hotel is comfortable, well-located, with delicious afternoon tea. The rooftop gym is excellent, and the swimming pool is beautiful with very clean water. The staff is friendly, and the rooms are equipped with a refrigerator, bathtub, and very comfortable beds.

Anna là nhân viên chuyên nghiệp, thân thiện và nhiệt tình nhất. Cô ấy không chỉ giỏi tiếng Việt, tiếng Anh, và tiếng Trung mà còn rất hữu ích. Chúng tôi rất biết ơn sự giúp đỡ của cô ấy.
Khách sạn này thoải mái, vị trí rất tốt, có bữa trưa ngon. Phòng tập gym trên tầng mái rất tuyệt vời, và hồ bơi đẹp với nước rất sạch sẽ. Nhân viên thân thiện, và phòng có tủ lạnh, bồn tắm, và giường rất thoải mái.

review.rating: The staff was fantastic, services was friendly and very prompt, and the hotel itself is quirky and fun. Location was per
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Sense City Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive: The friendly staff and service provided, and the breakfast buffet!

review.rating: That was great!
review.room_type: Phòng Spring Field (Không Có Cửa Sổ) Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive:
The hotel was conveniently located, the facilities were up-to-date, and the staff were friendly and helpful. 

We were offered a welcome drink on arrival! Our room was very well equipped for a relaxing time after a long day walking around.

The architecture was even better than the pictures - it was almost as if it were a sightseeing expedition in itself.

The staff, especially Viet, Jennifer, Billy, Ha, Nancy, were very motivated and enthusiastic. They even took time out from their day to talk to us about Vietnam and Vietnamese culture. They gave us tips and made suggestions for things to do and places to eat.
review.comment_negative: It was a bit awkward having to go through the dining area to access the pool, but the inconvenience was minor. The pool area was too small for the size of the hotel, but we enjoyed the view and the infinity pool. We also enjoyed the sauna, steam room and jacuzzi.

Anna is the most professional, friendly, and enthusiastic staff member. She is not only fluent in Vietnamese, English, and Chinese but also very helpful. We are very grateful for her assistance.

This hotel is comfortable, well-located, with delicious afternoon tea. The rooftop gym is excellent, and the swimming pool is beautiful with very clean water. The staff is friendly, and the rooms are equipped with a refrigerator, bathtub, and very comfortable beds.

Anna là nhân viên chuyên nghiệp, thân thiện và nhiệt tình nhất. Cô ấy không chỉ giỏi tiếng Việt, tiếng Anh, và tiếng Trung mà còn rất hữu ích. Chúng tôi rất biết ơn sự giúp đỡ của cô ấy.
Khách sạn này thoải mái, vị trí rất tốt, có bữa trưa ngon. Phòng tập gym trên tầng mái rất tuyệt vời, và hồ bơi đẹp với nước rất sạch sẽ. Nhân viên thân thiện, và phòng có tủ lạnh, bồn tắm, và giường rất thoải mái.

review.rating: The staff was fantastic, services was friendly and very prompt, and the hotel itself is quirky and fun. Location was per
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Sense City Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive: The friendly staff and service provided, and the breakfast buffet!

review.rating: That was great!
review.room_type: Phòng Spring Field (Không Có Cửa Sổ) Với Trà Chiều
review.comment_positive:
The hotel was conveniently located, the facilities were up-to-date, and the staff were friendly and helpful. 

We were offered a welcome drink on arrival! Our room was very well equipped for a relaxing time after a long day walking around.

The architecture was even better than the pictures - it was almost as if it were a sightseeing expedition in itself.

The staff, especially Viet, Jennifer, Billy, Ha, Nancy, were very motivated and enthusiastic. They even took time out from their day to talk to us about Vietnam and Vietnamese culture. They gave us tips and made suggestions for things to do and places to eat.
review.comment_negative: It was a bit awkward having to go through the dining area to access the pool, but the inconvenience was minor. The pool area was too small for the size of the hotel, but we enjoyed the view and the infinity pool. We also enjoyed the sauna, steam room and jacuzzi.
